original_text: Those who remain alive will escape. They will run to the mountains. They will be like doves that hunters have chased out of the valleys. They will cry aloud because of their sins.
korean_text: 도망하는 자는 산 위로 피하여 다 각기 자기 죄악 때문에 골짜기의 비둘기들처럼 슬피 울 것이며

sentences.original_text: Those who remain alive will escape
They will run to the mountains
that hunters have chased out of the valleys
They will cry aloud because of their sins
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 자신들의 죄 때문에 크게 울 것이다
